definitions.description: Entity for capturing data on items/SKU inventoried such as input material and finished goods.

constantValues: Entity for capturing data on items/SKU inventoried such as input material and finished goods.

members.name: sustainabilityitemskuId
members.description: The unique identifier of the item in the undertaking’s upstream systems.

constantValues: The unique identifier of the item in the undertaking’s upstream systems.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Item

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'SustainabilityItemSKU' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Item

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'SustainabilityItemSKU' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Item

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the item.

members.name: casnumber
members.description: Chemical Abstracts Service

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description that provides more details about the attribute.

constantValues: Optional description that provides more details about the attribute.

members.name: globaltradeitemnumber
members.description: The Global Trade Item Number (GTIN).

members.name: sustainabilityitemcategorysku
members.description: The category of the item defined by the undertaking in its upstream systems.

constantValues: The category of the item defined by the undertaking in its upstream systems.

members.name: itemtype
members.description: The type of item such as input material, or finished good.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'itemtype_display' is added to the 'SustainabilityItemSKU' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'itemtype'
supportingAttribute.name: itemtype_display

constantValues: The type of item such as input material, or finished good.

members.name: material
members.description: The material the item is made of.

constantValues: The material the item is made of.

members.name: sustainabilityproduct
members.description: Lookup to the company name for the sustainability product.

constantValues: Lookup to the company name for the sustainability product.

members.name: validtodate
members.description: The date up to which the product will remain active. This date can be in the future.

constantValues: The date up to which the product will remain active. This date can be in the future.

members.name: valuechainpartner
members.description: The supplier name that is supplying this item from the undertaking’s upstream systems.

constantValues: The supplier name that is supplying this item from the undertaking’s upstream systems.

members.name: volumeunit
members.description: The unit of measure used for the item volume.

constantValues: The unit of measure used for the item volume.

members.name: weight
members.description: The weight of the item.

members.name: weightunit
members.description: The unit of measure used for the item volume.

constantValues: The unit of measure used for the item volume.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: Optional field to store origin correlation id

constantValues: Optional field to store origin correlation id
